ATS Master Pack V1.0 contains my sight adjusted for the following vehicles:

US
- AGS
- M1 Abrams (All Variants)
- M1128
- XM-1 (Both Variants)

Germany
- Leopard 2 (All Variants)
- Leopard A1A1
- T-72M1
- Class 3 (P)
- Vilkas

USSR
- BMD-4
- BMP-2M
- Object 292
- T-72AV Turms
- T-72M2 Moderna

UK
- Challenger 1 MK3 (Both variants)

Japan
- Type 10 (All Variants)
- Type 16 (All Variants)
- Type 74 (All Variants)
- Type 89
- Type 90 (All Variants)

Sweden
- CV90 (All Variants)
- CT-CV 105HP
- K9 VIDAR
- Strv 121/122/Leopard 2 (All Variants)
- T-72M1
- T-80U...

~OPERATION FULDA GAP EVENT SIGHTS~
To join the event, add "th3dankduck" on Discord and send him a message. The first battle is on the 23rd of June.

We're in the 80s and the cold war is in full swing. It is expected that the Soviets will abuse the Fulda gap to b-line through West Germany and split our frontline in two. To defend the weakspot the 3rd Armored Division and the 11th Armored Cavalry are in the area ready to respond and hold back the Red flood.

Pack includes:

  • M1 Abrams
  • M60A3 TTS
  • M60A1 (AOS)
  • M60A1 (RISE/P) [Magach 6B]
    <...

当前版本：2.37.0.9这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.37.0.9 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.com 】...

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Sight pack for all Hawker Hurricane planes, as requested by a user. For planes supporting RP-3 or RBS-82 rockets, a rocket sight is provided. The 40mm guns have their own sight and work out to 600m fantastically.

To aim rockets best, use the main box when near or over 350 kmh, and the do...

New variant of my old sight

you use the squad ping and count how many grid squared it is away, then look under the triangular table to find the multiplier

for example 3 grid squares across and 2 grids squares up would have a multiplier of 4.5

you then multiply the grid size by that number, the top table is a multiplication table for helping those people that suck at multiplication (me)


#sights, #fictional, #artillery, #sniping, #rangefinder

there are three sights on this pack, one for arties like the Sturmpanzer, one for normal tanks like the Shermans, and one for big and ...

SEMI HISTORICAL AMERICAN M60 PLATFORM PACK
Tested on 1080p only

Included in this pack are all M60s found in the USA tech tree. If you downloaded my previous M60 sights, I recommend you replace those with the ones in this pack.
This might or might not work with M60s from other tech trees, such as the Magachs.

Sights are based off of documentation and manuals.

Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit

#sight #usa #m60 #m60a1 #m60a2 #m60a3 #m728

#alltanks
#all_tanks
#anime
#helltaker
#lucifer

Installation:
Extract and drop the blk files. UserSights/all_tanks

Sight for Churchill AVRE

Updated on 2024.06.18
- Adjusted the position of rangefinding result from crew, so it should stay inside displays with different ratios. Tested with 16:9 and 16:10. Appreciate @Константинович7 for mentioning the issue.
(If the position is still not ideal for anyone, opening the sight with a text editor and editing the number after "rangefinderHorizontalOffset" might help)

Updated on 2024.06.16
- Added shell angle-of-fall estimation on different distances;
- Added a legend showing the visual front-side ratio for an assumed target, w...
